Taller and favored class. grander in physical appearance than others of their race, gray elves have a reputation for being aloof and arrogant (even by elven Wood Elf standards). They certainly are more reclusive than high elves, living Also called sylvan elves, members of this subrace live deep in pri- in isolated mountain citadels and allowing entry only to a select mordial forests. Their hair color ranges from yellow to a coppery few outsiders. They have either silver hair and amber eyes or pale red, and they are more muscular than other elves. They prefer clothing of white, silver, in dark shades of green and earth tones to better blend in with yellow, or gold, with cloaks of deep blue or purple. their natural surroundings.
